page.title: 15BECKLEY & HORTON CLUBS
page.content:
BECKLEY - Youth Club, Brownies, Scouts, Cub Scouts, Women Institute, Football Club, Football Training. HORTON -Clay Pigeon Shooting,Pony Club, Riding for the Disabled, Cricket, Women Institute, Studley Singers.
Cubs meet in Jubilee House on Thursdays Boys aged 8-11 may join. We play games and have fun.Every year we go to camp. Scouts are for boys aged 11-16. They meet in Jubilee House and play games, get badges, go on expeditions & camps. Football training is held on Saturday mornings for children of any age. The Youth Club held in the Village Hall on Fridays is for children aged over 8. They play snooker, pool, darts, rounders,etc. and go on trips. There is a tuck shop selling sweets,crisps and drinks.
